name: RF Capital Group Inc. 5-Year Rate Reset Preferred Shares Series B
longDescription: RF Capital Group Inc is a financial services firm. The company's operating segment includes Wealth Management and Corporate. It generates maximum revenue from the Wealth Management segment. The operations segment provides carrying broker services to third parties, including trade execution, clearing, and settlement services.
